title: “Well, how was that?”
summary: Crow’s enjoying himself. And Robin is here to help as well!
details: This was going to be just lighting practice but I had drawn Crow way on the right side of the canvas by accident (1st image) and I liked how the leftover space felt…ominous…so the idea for something to appear there was the result of the second image.

imgs.alt: Art of Crow from Persona 5, holding his light saber sword up and resting in his left hand. He's smiling widely.
Art of Crow from Persona 5, holding his light saber sword up and resting in his left hand. He's smiling widely with his Robin Hood Persona behind him and crouched down, looking downwards.

thumbnailAlt: Crow with Robin Hood behind him.
